instructions: Open the Google Home app . Tap Settings . Scroll down to "Google Assistant services," then tap More Settings . Tap Payments and then Next . Enter your payment method details. If you have already added a new payment method for another Google service, for example Google Play, tap that payment method to use it with Google Shopping. If you want to add a payment method, tap Add credit or debit card. Enter the card information, billing name, billing street address, and phone number. Review the card details and tap Save. Add your delivery address: If you've already added a delivery address for another Google service, you can choose that delivery address. Tap Next. If you need to add an address, tap Add new address. Enter your name, delivery address, and phone number. Tap Save. Choose your Assistant payment settings. Turn Allow payments with your Assistant on or off . Turn Confirm your identity before paying on or off . Turn Use fingerprint to confirm identity on or off . Tap Done .
